comments.html:
Will Lawton from FB pasted his F5 config in ppt slides, that Don presented at Google IPv6 Implementors conference 2010.

https://sites.google.com/site/ipv6implementors/2010/agenda -> find Don Lee in agenda...

After presentation I had a long discussion with Will about that matter and he confirmed that this stuff just works even on a very large scale, as FB network is.

Pipi, excellent post, very helpful.
comments.name: Jan Zorz

comments.html: Good post, thanks. Zeus Traffic Manager can also do something like this, including having the same virtual server listen on multiple v4 and/or v6 traffic IPs. http://goo.gl/9HDxk
comments.name: Jason Braddy
